publishedfiledetails.title: Florida Man
publishedfiledetails.file_description: While high on flake you seem to have openned up a portal to some strange land where rats explode and gaint sloths roam. Thankfully your not alone as your pet allegator Bob has joined you. How will you Florida man survive with the last of your flake and your trusty pal Bob.(it won't let me choose the pet so random Bob) Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 1 people, chosen from 8. Player starting characters have a 45% chance to start with trait: Chemical interest All characters have a 37% chance to have their recreation set between 9.8% and 20%. Start with: -Random pet x1 -Hunting rifle -Uranium gladius

publishedfiledetails.title: Get to work!
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Congratulations on your selection in Glitterworld Getaways, <user_name>! It had seemed like it was too good to be true, but they followed through on their promise to let you start a new life, far from the troubles behind you. Five people crammed into a small ship that seemed to be designed for three, delivered by drop pods on this unknown rimworld. The instructions don't match the supplies, though, and it looks suspiciously like other drop pods were landed here before... --- No ship parts, but you get steel chunks nearby. Supplies otherwise identical to classic start. Periodically get Ambrosia sproutings, enemy raids, transport crashes, quests, trading ships, and infestations. Thrumbos pass in the early game. Your faction will be a new arrivals. Start with 5 people, chosen from 8. Incident created: -Thrumbos pass -Quest -Transport pod crash -Orbital trader arrival -Enemy raid -Ambrosia sprout -Infestation Start with: -Silver x800 -Packaged survival meal x50 -Medicine x30 -Component x30 -Bolt-action rifle -Revolver -Plasteel knife -Flak pants -Flak vest -Plasteel flak helmet -Random pet x1 -Steel slag chunk x5 -Steel x450 -Wood x300 Map is scattered with: -Steel slag chunk x3 -Steel x720 -Packaged survival meal x7

publishedfiledetails.title: The Sole Survivors
publishedfiledetails.file_description: On your annual vacation cruse ship trip, the ship is shot by a very powerful weapon. As everyone scrambles for the escape pods, the cannon fires again tearing the ship in half. Some made it to the pods, but many are left behind in space. However, the cannon starts powering up again. It destroy's many pods next to yours but you are lucky enough to not get hit. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 2 people, chosen from 8. Arrive in drop pods. publishedfiledetails.title: изи3
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Из-за того, что вы покинули свой уютный утопический мир, люди называли вас сумасшедшим, но вы всегда жаждали исследовать звёзды за пределами нейросимулятора. Наконец, после долгого путешествия в криптосне вы совершили посадку на неизвестной планете, полной загадок. Внимание: поскольку ваш персонаж не владеет некоторыми навыками, этот сценарий имеет крайне высокую сложность на ранних этапах игры. Тип вашей фракции: Поселение. Выбрать 4 людей из 8 Прибытие в спасательных капсулах. publishedfiledetails.title: Naked Brutality
publishedfiledetails.file_description: You went under anesthetic for a minor surgery. Now you've awoken in a drop pod crashing into a distant planet. You're naked, alone, and totally unprepared. Can you survive? Warning: There is nothing fair about this scenario - it is extremely difficult and death can happen for any reason. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 2 people, chosen from 8. Player starting characters start naked. Start with: -Timber wolf x2 Map is scattered with: -Insectoid mutagenic serum x2

publishedfiledetails.title: Naked and Afraid
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Since you'll start poor and lack technology, this is a difficult scenario. Your faction will be a New Tribe. Start with 6 people, chosen from 8.

publishedfiledetails.title: SecForce Alpha
publishedfiledetails.file_description: It was supposed to be a simple job : head out to some hickworld on the Rim and recover a crashed ship. It didn't end up that way, though -- some archaotech defense system blew your transport clean in half and almost slagged your assault shuttle too. You came down hard, with only the gear in the armory you could salvage and a ton of scrap metal and ship chunks. Your engineer managed to trigger a droppod of supplies -- a bit of food, repair equipment, and thankfully, some sentry guns. The problem is your shuttle is gone and none of you are really the scientific type. To make matters worse, the whole reason you were dispatched on such an urgent mission is that the planet you are now stranded on... ...is in the direct path of a planetkiller weapon. Your faction will be a New Tribe. Start with 6 people, chosen from 6. Player starting characters have a 100% chance to start with trait: Tough Planetkiller: An interstellar planetkiller weapon is approaching this planet. It will smash the planet apart like a rifle bullet hitting an egg, annihilating all life. (1000.0 days) Start with: -Packaged survival meal x60 -Medicine x30 -Component x30 -Charge driver x2 -Charge railgun x2 -Charge LMG x2 -Marine armor x6 -Survival knife x6 -Vibranium sentry gun x8 Map is scattered with: -Ship chunk x50 -Steel slag chunk x200

publishedfiledetails.title: prison transport scenario (by mama)
publishedfiledetails.file_description: prisoner transport crashed on a planet... hf :D 21 year old inmates starting naked with cryptosleep sickness & malnutrition a small amount of survival meals and medicine is provided no weapons, tools or pets... its a prisoner trasport, not a holiday ship

publishedfiledetails.title: 4 Escape pod survivors (Hostile Planet)
publishedfiledetails.file_description: All 10 members awake from the cryopods to find that the ship was under attack, while hearing the evacuation sirens hearing the hull being breached. 4 of you are able get to the escape pods before the ship is destroyed by an unknown enemy. The remaining crew members refused to leave without taking extra supplies. The 4 of you land safely on the unknown planet on the rim of known space that was in close proximity of the ship. You were lucky that the escape pods were fully stocked with enough supplies for 6 days, along with some armour and sniper rifles for each crew member. Unfortunately all of the silver was left on the ship to make space for the supplies. Luckily that someone grabbed some blueprints. How long can you survive on this Hostile Planet? Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 4 people, chosen from 10. Arrive in drop pods. All characters have a 100% chance to start with trait: Optimist All characters have a 100% chance to start with trait: Too smart Start with research: Tree sowing Start with research: Hydroponics Incident(s) disabled: -Psychic drone -Self-tame Start with: -Packaged survival meal x60 -Medicine x20 -Wood x1215 -Steel x525 -Component x5 -Marble blocks x250 -Sniper rifle x4 -Flak jacket x4 -Cryptosleep casket x2

publishedfiledetails.title: 异世界
publishedfiledetails.file_description: 多名会魔法能觉醒原力的老鼠兔子龙人们，在难度不大且有回复发力的buff的星球上开始的旅行，你们的目的很简单，活下去（并且去实验mod）最终倒斗获得征服世界的能力。 玩家派系: 新移民 开局人数: 6，候选人数: 6 已禁用以下随机事件: -耀斑 -法力反噬 -法力流失 永久游戏状态: -魔力涌动: 行星的天象导致了魔力变得汹涌澎湃。所有与魔法力量协调的生物，法力会得到一定量的增长。 地图散落资源: -包装生存食品 x200

publishedfiledetails.title: Lone Cowpoke [Donkey Edition]
publishedfiledetails.file_description: You're a lone cowpoke. You've only got the resources in your saddle bag, the clothes on your back, the big iron on your hip, and your trusty steed. Recommended settings/roleplay: -Set the rainfall lower and temperature higher on worldgen -Choose an arid climate -Choose a cowpoke alignment (ranging from Sheriff to Outlaw) -Rename your donkey to form an emotional bond -You can settle down and build up a wild west town or a ranch, or even be a nomadic drifter only settling in a map tile for a couple seasons before moving on to greener pastures Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 1 people, chosen from 1. Player starting characters have a 50% chance to start with trait: Trigger-happy Incident(s) disabled: -Wanderer join -Self-tame Start with: -Silver x100 -Packaged survival meal x5 -Medicine x5 -Revolver -Donkey x1 -Bison wool cowboy hat -Bison wool duster -Kibble x75

publishedfiledetails.title: The Beautiful Stranger's Vacation Trip
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Finally, after years of hard work from your recent job as model, you can finally take a big break and now have enough silver to go on a nice vacation trip! Unfortunately, you weren't very smart on applying for that "EXTREMELY SAFE AND CHEAP VACATION TO PARADISE PACKAGE" and how you didnt read the small fine print that it would send you on a one way trip to the rimworlds. Now here you are, alone.... Well not really, atleast you still have your loyal husky and you have adequate supplies to last you awhile. Who knows you might find a friend to attach all those implants your boss gave you along with a sweet bowler hat. Lucky you! Good luck, oh beautiful stranger and may you have the vacation of a lifetime. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 1 people, chosen from 8. Your people will be between 18 and 25 years old. Player starting characters have a 100% chance to start with trait: Beautiful Start with: -Packaged survival meal x40 -Medicine x30 -Component x30 -Bolt-action rifle -Husky x1 -Steel x450 -Wood x300 -Aesthetic nose -Love enhancer -Aesthetic shaper -Silver x300 -Foxfur bowler hat

publishedfiledetails.title: The Glitter Agenda
publishedfiledetails.file_description: The aim of the mission was simple: Get to The Rim and colonise the planets. But when your spaceship gets sabotaged by a rival company, you are forced to evacuate to the nearest planet. In the confusion escape pods went everywhere scattered about the surface. And yet, eager to complete the mission a small team of Glitterworld scientists set to work on creating a sustainable colony and perhaps spread across the globe... Some equipment made it's way to you, but ultimately you are on your own in the wilderness. !NOTE! This Scenario Does require one of the 'Glitter Tech' mods to make some sense, but ultimately you can play however you like. :) GT mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725576127 Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 4 people, chosen from 4. Arrive in drop pods. publishedfiledetails.title: 边缘反抗军
publishedfiledetails.file_description: 帝国对边缘世界的压迫已经持续了上千年，这几千年以来，帝国一直是天下无双的代名词，击败了所有试图反抗的组织。但十年前的一次成功袭击，戳穿了帝国天下无双的面罩。一支反抗军就此成立，解放了边缘世界的许多星球，但在旷日持久的正面战场中也蒙受了巨大的损失。 为扭转局面，反抗军决定成立特种作战小组，深入敌后进行特种作战，你就是第一支特种部队。你将会携带在先前的战役中缴获的一些帝国装备，乔装潜入一颗行星，试图寻找合适的时机，消灭帝国在这颗行星上的势力。 注意：这是一次伟大而危险的尝试，任务启动后，你将彻底脱离反抗军的控制范围，你的一切行动都不再受总部指挥，但是希望你不要堕落，牢记你的使命，反抗军仍然有最后的极端手段以解决这颗星球的一切问题。 玩家派系: 新移民 开局人数: 6，候选人数: 8 以空投方式抵达。 歼星武器: 一个星际歼星武器正在接近这颗星球。当其命中时，所有生命将会被毁灭。 (1200.0 天) 开局资源: -白银 x2000 -包装生存食品 x50 -医药 x30 -零部件 x30 -电荷步枪 x6 -小型冲击炮塔 x2 -单分子剑 -等离子剑 -轨道能量束靶向器 x2 -钢铁 x450 -原木 x300 -破碎帝国头盔 -破碎帝国装甲 -护盾腰带 x2 -斥候头盔 x2 -斥候装甲 x2 -海军头盔 x3 -海军装甲 x3 地图散落资源: -飞船残骸 x3 -钢铁 x720 -包装生存食品 x7

publishedfiledetails.title: Nostrum Est
publishedfiledetails.file_description: You are an 8 person crew tasked with claiming land for your imperialist nation Nostrum Estus. A multiplanetary empire that believes in claiming as many planets for themselves as they can. Your crew is imbued great nationalist pride and a strong obligation to succeed. Your homeworld is a highly ordered police state that prioritizes strict living and lavish luxuries for the privileged. The stresses and pressures of growing in such a fierce orderly society has taken its toll on your colonists. You start with ample resources but your colonists aren't the friendlist and they're used to lavish lifestyles. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 8 people, chosen from 10. Your people will be between 18 and 35 years old. Arrive in drop pods. publishedfiledetails.title: 생존 실험 대상자
publishedfiledetails.file_description: 당신은 상상을 초월하게 가난한 어느 가정에서 태어나 갖은 고생은 다 하다가, 결국 집에서 당신을 감당하지 못해서 쫓겨난 한 청소년입니다. 입에 풀칠이라도 하기 위해 길거리를 돌아다니며 애를 쓰다가 큰돈을 벌 수 있다는 말에 '생존 실험'의 대상자로 자진참여했습니다. 그게 무슨 실험인지조차 알려고 하지 않고 말이죠. 너무나도 가난했던 나머지 문맹이었기 때문에 그 실험의 내용조차 이해하지 못하고 그냥 하겠다고 말한 당신은, 그들이 당신의 손목을 잡고 당신을 우주선으로 밀어 넣을 때에서야 뭔가 잘못됐다는 것을 직감했습니다. 그러나 이미 때는 늦었고, 당신은 당신이 벗 삼아 지내던 쥐 하나만 데리고 아무도 그곳이 어디인지 알지 못하는 변방계 행성으로 향합니다... 당신의 세력은 외부인들입니다. 1명 중에서 선택한 1명으로 시작합니다. 구성원들은 최대 19살 입니다. 낙하기로 도착합니다. 플레이어 시작 캐릭터는 100%의 확률로 다음 특성을 지닙니다: 검소 플레이어 시작 캐릭터는 100%의 확률로 다음 특성을 지닙니다: 근면성실 플레이어 시작 캐릭터는 100%의 확률로 다음 특성을 지닙니다: 병약체질 플레이어 시작 캐릭터는 100%의 확률로 다음 특성을 지닙니다: 약골 플레이어 시작 캐릭터는 100%의 확률로 영양실조를 지닙니다. 사건 비활성화: -방랑자 합류 영구적 지속효과: -기후 변화: 행성의 궤도 변화로 인한 다년간의 기후 변화입니다. 함께 시작: -쥐 x1

publishedfiledetails.title: Ciber-Forajidos
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Estos seres escapan de la situacion que vivieron, que aunque triunfantes salieron, en ellas sus mentes perecieron, tienen grandes implantes roboticos, pero sus mentes estan destruidas debido a lo vivido. Un antiguo pasado qe no olvidan y que temen volver a vivir, quiza estos lo hagan, pero recuerda que no son cualquiera, son los mejores para asesinar, encarcelar, y ganar una batalla, sin embargo la condena mental sera tan ardua que no querras matar. Estos son muy ricos ya que destruyeron a todos sus enemigos y amigos. CUIDADO LA LOCURA PODRIA GANARTE ESTA BATALLA Tu facción será Los Recién LLegados. Empieza con 4 personas, elige de 4. Iniciar caracteres jugables tiene una 34% posibilidad de empezar con el rasgo: Psicópata Iniciar caracteres jugables tiene una 32% posibilidad de tener su estado de ánimo establecido entre 0% y 73%. Comenzar con la investigación: Biónica Comenzar con la investigación: Rifles de precisión Comenzar con la investigación: Energía geotermica Las estadisticas 'Umbral de colapso mental' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 100%. Las estadisticas 'Velocidad de investigación' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 264%. Las estadisticas 'Precisión (quemarropa)' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 250%. Las estadisticas 'Precisión (corta)' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 200%. Las estadisticas 'Precisión (media)' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 150%. Las estadisticas 'Precisión (larga)' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 100%. Las estadisticas 'oportunidad de éxito al construir' pueden ser universalmente multiplicadas por 278%. Empezar con: -Plata x7500 -Comida de supervivencia envasada x75 -Medicina x50 -Componentes x45 -Rifle de francotirador -Rifle de asalto -Minigun -Rifle energético -Chaleco antibalas x4 -Casco avanzado de plastiacero x4 -Mascota al azar x4 -Acero x1450 -Madera x300 Se dispersan en el mapa: -Trozo de nave -Acero x720 -Comida de supervivencia envasada x7

publishedfiledetails.title: Teleported in Time
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Your tribe was destroyed by the great blood machines sent by the gods. Ten of you managed to escape. Now, it's time to build up a new home. Note: Since you'll start poor and research slowly, this is a difficult scenario. It is made easier by choosing suped up characters. Your faction will be a New Tribe. Start with 10 people, chosen from 10. Arrive in drop pods. All characters start naked. Map is scattered with: -Component x300 -Advanced component x100 -Granite blocks x9999

publishedfiledetails.title: A World Full of Hate
publishedfiledetails.file_description: The world and everything in it wants to KILL you and EAT you. Good Luck! You'll need it! -Jack Cass a.k.a the guy who stole your ship suckas Jack Cass has stolen your ship and was kind enough to let you and your two most loyal crew live. He has ejected your pods above a primitive hostile planet, full of bloodlusting cannibals. He has wiped your memories of all knowledge of survival and any research you may of have found along the way and striped you down to nothing. There are things that you will find you are naturally gifted at doing but your mind is primitive. You must adapt/discover/research and get off this rock. You must survive; you tell yourself over and over, Jack Cass must pay for what he has done!

publishedfiledetails.title: Alone and brutal, crashed prison ship survivor
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Alarms blared when the prison ship came out of warp, and then the explosions started. You went straight to a lifepod where a large explosion knocked you out. You've awoken in a drop pod crashing into a distant planet on the Rim. You're alone and totally unprepared, with only the basics from the lifepod. Can you survive? Best played with temperature set to minimum, and starting in tundra/ice sheet or something similarly inhospitable. Solar flare has been disabled because I don´t like it. Note: damage is upped to 150% making this even more deadly. Warning: There is nothing fair about this scenario - it is extremely difficult and death can happen for any reason. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 1 people, chosen from 8. Arrive in drop pods. Player starting characters start naked. The stat "damage multiplier" will be universally multiplied by 150%. Start with: -Synthread pants -Synthread button-down shirt -Packaged survival meal x7

publishedfiledetails.title: 蟲群ノ星【ver1.0】
publishedfiledetails.file_description: この星は巨大な蟲で溢れかえっている。 無力なヒトが生き残るには、あまりに過酷な環境下だ。 文明は殆ど存在せず、飛来する虫によりヒトの群れは狩られ、滅びの道を辿っているた。 　貴方達の部族が見つけた土地には、一定周期で宇宙の塵が飛来する特徴がある様だ。 更に、運が良い事に巨大蜘蛛のコロニーが、貴方の部族に敵意を示さなかったのだ！ この虫達と共に部族繁栄を行い、外敵の襲来に備えると良いだろう！ あなたの派閥は "部族民(新参者)" です. ゲームを 総勢10人の中から 9人を選んで始めます. プレイヤー初期キャラクターは 70%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -イイ人 全キャラクターは 50%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -よたか 非プレイヤーキャラクターは 25%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -食人嗜好者 非プレイヤーキャラクターは 25%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -自然体主義 非プレイヤーキャラクターは 25%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -サイコパス 全キャラクターは 25%の確率で,次の才能・性格を持っています: -ヌーディスト 非プレイヤーキャラクターは全裸です. 非プレイヤーキャラクターは,65%の確率で,食事欲求への満足度が,49%～100%となります. 非プレイヤーキャラクターは,65%の確率で,心情欲求への満足度が,80%～100%となります. 非プレイヤーキャラクターは,99%の確率で,睡眠欲求への満足度が,0%～30%となります. "劣化しやすさ" の効果は,すべてにおいて "400%" 掛けられます. "掘削・速度" の効果は,すべてにおいて "300%" 掛けられます. "地面をならす速度" の効果は,すべてにおいて "300%" 掛けられます. "命中精度(至近距離)" の効果は,すべてにおいて "200%" 掛けられます. "免疫を得る速度" の効果は,すべてにおいて "200%" 掛けられます. "調教成功率" の効果は,すべてにおいて "150%" 掛けられます. "近接武器でのダメージ倍率です." の効果は,すべてにおいて "150%" 掛けられます. "移動速度" の効果は,すべてにおいて "150%" 掛けられます. "命中率(射撃)" の効果は,すべてにおいて "150%" 掛けられます. "掘削・収率" の効果は,すべてにおいて "50%" 掛けられます. "生き物スキル必要量" の効果は,すべてにおいて "25%" 掛けられます. "外交力" の効果は,すべてにおいて "25%" 掛けられます. "政治力" の効果は,すべてにおいて "25%" 掛けられます. "手なずけ成功率" の効果は,すべてにおいて "10%" 掛けられます. "生皮の量" の効果は,すべてにおいて "10%" 掛けられます. 作成された偶発事件: -虫の襲来 -訪問者 -敵襲 -援軍 -宇宙船のガラクタ落下 -輸送ポッド落下 -旅行者 -放浪の野蛮人 -大群の移動 発生しない偶発事件: -死の灰 -火山の冬 開始時の所持品: -メガスパイダー x8 -ワーグ x1 -シルバー x800 -デビルストランド 部族の髪飾り -デビルストランド 一枚布 -ショートボウ x4 -鉄製 スピア x3 -投槍 x2 -簡単な食事 x9 -ペットフード x9 -焚き火 マップ上に撒かれる物: -宇宙船の一部 x2 -宇宙船の残骸 x3 -メガスパイダーの肉 x50 -インセクトゼリー x80 -象の牙 -鉄くずの塊 x75 -スチール x400 -コンポーネント x320 -鶏卵(有精卵) x5 -キノコ(生) x30 -リュウゼツラン(生) x30 -ベリー(生) x30

publishedfiledetails.title: Tahvohck-Tweaks
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Various tweaks to things I didn't like. Power systems Wind turbine -> Mid, difficult, fickle: - Cost: 300 steel, 3 component - Max power: 12kW based off of rough calculations in conjuction with: this MIT presentation - (This is 8kW internally because Wind Turbines are bovine fecal matter) Wood generator -> Early, easy: - Cost: 75 steel, 1 component - Power: 3.2kW based on generic research - 15 wood per day (boosted from 22/day) - Can push temperature up to 650C Geothermal -> End game, passive, powerful, expensive: - Cost: 800 steel, 12 components - Power: 45kW (given sizes and balance, location restrictions) Batteries -> General buff, based on Lithium-Sulfur batteries as a theroetical base, with 30 cm of plating and 1m x 1m x 2m dimensions (~646L). - Stored power: 10kWd - Efficiency: 85% - Mass: 510 kg (shit's heavy yo, 480kg cells + 30kg plating) - Short circuit: less likely (1.2 ->; 0.4), minimum refire days increased (8 ->; 45) Stack changes - Compacted steel drops in chunks of 50 now (up from 40) to account for increased costs - Slag melting returns 35 chunks now (up from 20) - Bricks now stack to 200 - Meals now stack to 20 - Plant raw food stacks to 200 (6kg) - Hay stacks to 2500 (35kg) Cost changes Moisture pump -> Speed boost paid for by smaller final size. - Cost: 45 steel, 3 components (It's small + you have to move it around more) - Reduced time to completion to 1 season - Reduced final size to 4.9 Vent build cost reduced to 4 steel Cooler build cost reduced: 90 steel -> 45 Cooler build cost increased: 3 steel -> 5 Factions Civil factions now start between 0 and 30 opinion. Rough factions now start between -10 and -40 opinion. Outlanders (all) and rough tribes now start with two factions Civil tribes now start with four factions. (This change from previous versions was to reduce spam and hopefully get a performance boost) Mod Related IF INSTALLED: Centralized Climate Control Wall vents cost reduced greatly: 50 Steel down to 2 steel (They're just open ducts yo) IF INSTALLED: Extra Storage - Clothing rack stack multiplier greatly increased: 10x to 40x to account for both squares and two shelves per square. IF INSTALLED: RT Fuse - Bring the fuses in line with the new battery values (3x batteries per fuse). Strikethrough items are because I lost the original patch and haven't recreated it yet.

publishedfiledetails.title: The Family! V2 (1.1)
publishedfiledetails.file_description: The Family! V2 -This scenario was made last year with my close friend and I have fun memories of having fun an having my friend get into the game. I am kinda remastering with my personal -The Family!- kept under wrap. This is made to remember of my close close friend. Hope you guys like it an I hope you guys give this scenario a like. If you guys need any changes to it please either PM me or leave a comment down below.- -Summary- The 2 of you got married and was at the after party getting drunk. The last thing you guys remember was the last dance before leaving to sleep the drunk-ness off for the early wake-up for your guys shifts. (Name your pawns first names whatever you want but it needs to be the same last names of whatever you want) -Game Start Dialog- Your partner and you are just coming back from a marriage party. The last thing that you guys remember is falling asleep together. The moment your partner came back from the bathroom the sirens began and you guys got your stuff on an ran to the escape pods with some food an couple weapons. Can you last? -Start with 2 people, chosen from 10.- -Player starting characters have a 25% chance to start with hangover.- -Start with- -Packaged Survival Meal x50 -Medicine x25 -Bolt-action rifle x2 -Start with Packaged Survival Meal x2 -Ship Chunk Drop -Wander Joins -Start City (Ghost) -Removes/Addons/Changed- 05/14/2020 -Random Animal Spawn- Removed -Silver, Wood and Steel- Removed -Pawns (x4 to x2)- Changed -Bolt-action (x4 to x2)- Changed -Start with Packaged Survival Meal (x2)- Addon -Ship Chunk Drop (every 35 days)- Addon -Wander Joins (every 20 days)- Addon -Start City (Ghost)- Addon

publishedfiledetails.title: Uciekinier
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Twoje plemie zostało zaatakowane i zniszczone przez mechanoidy. Jako jeden z niewielu którzy przetrwali uciekłeś aby ośedlić się z dala od niebezpieczeństwa. Po drodze spotkałeś Wilka polarnego który był ranny. Pomogłeś mu a on do Ciebie dołączył. W plemieniu byłeś jednym z najmłodszych członków i nie została ci przekazana żadna wiedza. Wiesz tylko tyle co zdołałeś zaobserwować. Twoją frakcją będzie Nowe Plemię. Rozpocznij z 1 osobami, wybieranymi z 2. Twoje postacie nie będą miały więcej niż 19 lat. Rozpoczynasz z: -Dobry posiłek x2 -Wilk polarny x1

publishedfiledetails.title: The Lone Child
publishedfiledetails.file_description: As a child growing up in a tribe, you had a pretty nomadic but safe life. But nothing stays the same forever. Everything changed when one day a group of slavers captured your whole tribe and were sent to aboard a space ship to be sold. Luckly, you managed to escape on a pod and were sent back down to your planet. Now your all alone. ((NOTE the difference between this and Naked Brutality is that you start as a tribe (less research) and you're a child (no adult backstory)) Your faction will be a New Tribe. Start with 1 people, chosen from 10. Your people will be at most 19 years old. Player starting characters start naked.

publishedfiledetails.title: Lost on the Rim
publishedfiledetails.file_description: The Jupiter mission went horribly awry. The Robinson family and friends were woken from cryo as their ship was torn from hyperspace. The Jupiter crumbling around them, they managed to board a shuttle and escape certain death, coming to rest on a lonely planet somewhere on the Rim. Join the Robinsons as they try to survive on this hostile rim world. Rebuild the Jupiter 2 to escape in search of another, more friendly world to make their home. *This scenario is meant to be played in conjunction with 'Save our Ship 2' but you can keep it vanilla if you'd like. *EDB's Prepare Carefully is a good idea if you'd like to customize your pawns and make sure they have the correct skill-sets. Bonus challenge: -Accept all refugee events and calls for help. The Robinson's are not the type to look the other way, after all! -The Robinsons must survive to launch the Jupiter 2. If any of them are killed, start again. Starring in this story are Maureen and John Robinson, their children, Judy, Penny, and Will, Major Don West, and Doctor Zachary Smith. Your faction will be a New Tribe. Start with 7 people, chosen from 7. publishedfiledetails.title: Invasion of the Rebellious Teenagers
publishedfiledetails.file_description: Six teens are tired of the space life. They want a new life away from parents, school, and especially space. They have dreamed of living on an actual world, rather than ships. While aboard a school ship that is part of a convoy of traveling merchant ships, they wait for the first planet that can support life. After days of planning and slowly stocking up an escape pod or two with essentials, they finally get word they are entering orbit of a rimworld planet so the ships can resupply. Time to spring in action this master plan. Time to live happily ever after on an actual planet. Right? Your group will consist of 6 teenagers. The ages will range from 15- 19. You will start with no silver, as the convoy of trade ships kept all valuables and trade currency locked up in a well guarded ship that the teens had no access too. However, many medicines, weapons and food was taken with the teens. They even managed to take a pet with them as well. This is a medium difficulty scenario. With your new arrivals being teenagers, skills are not high and to top that off they have no money. On the flip side, you will have six 'know it all' teens to get started with. Keep in mind food production is key at start, as six teens will quickly eat though what they stole from the ship. Your faction will be a New Arrivals. Start with 6 people, chosen from 10. Your people will be at most 19 years old. Arrive in drop pods. Start with: -Simple packaged survival meal x50 -Medicine x30 -Component x30 -Bolt-action rifle -Revolver x3 -Steel knife x2 -Flak pants x2 -Plasteel plate vest x2 -Plasteel advanced helmet x2 -Random pet x1 -Steel x450 -Oak logs x300 Map is scattered with: -Steel x720 -Simple packaged survival meal x10

publishedfiledetails.file_description: Your ship was a colonization vessel, one of many on its way to a suitable planet to start a new chapter in human history. publishedfiledetails.title: Unfortunate Stellar Phenomenon
publishedfiledetails.file_description: An unknown gravimetric shockwave has thrown your pirate frigate off-course, severly damaging vital drive and atmoshperic controls in the process, automatically reviving you and the crew. You hear your shipboard AI initiate the cryptosleep jettison procedure, and before you know it, your pod, along with your crews, are screaming toward the surface of an unknown world just as your starships reactor blows and the ship vaporizes before you. publishedfiledetails.title: クーリン族の不時着
publishedfiledetails.file_description: 冬眠カプセルの中の,クーリン三人は,警報と船体が引き裂かれる音に起こされました.宇宙船がバラバラに四散する前に,なんとか脱出ポッドに乗ることが出来ました.少しの時間を経てあなた達はこの未確認のRimworldに着陸しました. あなたの派閥は "クーリンの村落" です. ゲームを 総勢8人の中から 3人を選んで始めます. 脱出ポッドで惑星に到着します. プレイヤー初期キャラクターは "50%"の確率で,"冷凍睡眠病" を持って始まります. 研究済み: -クーリンの簡単な衣類 開始時の所持品: -シルバー x800 -非常用食品 x50 -医薬品 x30 -コンポーネント x30 -軍用ライフル -リボルバー -プラスチール ナイフ -布 クーリンの軍服 -鉄製 クーリンの軍用ヘルメット☆ -アカギツネ x1 -スチール x450 -木材 x300 マップ上に撒かれる物: -宇宙船の残骸 x3 -スチール x720 -非常用食品 x7
